channel.title: Programming – Agile Staffordshire
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: F# and Functional Programming Wrap-up
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: Agile Staffordshire were fortunate to have Ian Russell talk to us about functional programming. Ian’s session on functional programming really got us fired up with something new. I was swept away with Ian’s abundant enthusiasm for the discipline; thank you, Ian! If you get the chance to meet Ian and discuss F#, I think you’d be wise […]

item.title: June 2014 – Is TDD Dead?
item.dc:creator: Jon Willis
item.description: Date: Thursday 26th June 2014 Time: 19:00 Venue: Staffordshire University – Stafford Campus (Octagon building, K102) Fear not, TDD is not dead, although it’s certainly been talked to death this month. This catchy title has been doing the rounds on the web recently since the Kent Beck + Martin Fowler + David Heinemeier Hansson talks. This month we are going to […]

item.title: Lean Code Retrospective
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: It’s great to consider concepts around a practical challenge. Lean code is best considered with a working example. It doesn’t take a complex/large problem to highlight the issues and this session hit home. Paul Williams gave a ‘lightning talk’ on Lean Code based on slides by Chris Parsons, and quickly got us in front of […]

item.title: May 2014 – Lean Code Challenge
item.dc:creator: paulswilliams
item.description: Date: Thursday 29th May 2014 Time: 19:00 Venue: Staffordshire University – Stafford Campus (Octagon building, K102) For this month’s session, we’ve decided to re-run the Lean Code Challenge that was run back in July 2011. The format is quite simple – Paul will introduce 7 key Lean Software principles and their importance in software development. Following this, the code challenge will […]

item.title: Anagram Kata (Strikes Back)
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: Date: Thursday 27th March 2014 Time: 19:00 Venue: Staffordshire University – Stafford Campus (Octagon building, K102) March is all about code kata. We shall be visiting a kata that has been run before – Anagram! If you do not know what code kata is, start with Dave’s Blog and then read his anagram kata post. We like change, so consider […]

item.title: Lego Robots
item.dc:creator: paulswilliams
item.description: Date: Thursday 27th February 2014 Time: 7:00pm Venue: Staffordshire University – Stafford Campus (Octagon building, K102) This month, LEGO ROBOTS! Andrew Seward (@MrAndrew) will show us how to bring together as one the two higher art forms of programming and Lego – an overview of what’s involved and why it’s such a great idea, and then we’ll get the […]
